mapper.select: SELECT CODE, NAME FROM TBL_CODE WHERE CODE LIKE '%A_%'

SELECT BOOK.IBOOK, BOOK.TITLE, BOOK.AUTHOR, BOOK.PUBLISHER, BOOK.PUBLISHER_DATE, BOOK.GENRE, BOOK.COMMENT, BOOK.THUMBNAIL, CODE.CODE AS READING_STATUS_CODE, CODE.NAME AS READING_STATUS_NAME FROM TBL_BOOK BOOK INNER JOIN TBL_CODE CODE ON BOOK.READING_STATUS = CODE.CODE WHERE CODE.CODE = #{searchReadingStatusCode}

SELECT HIGHLIGHT.IHIGHLIGHT, HIGHLIGHT.IBOOK, HIGHLIGHT.HIGHLIGHT, BOOK.TITLE, BOOK.AUTHOR, HIGHLIGHT.CREATED_AT FROM TBL_HIGHLIGHT HIGHLIGHT INNER JOIN TBL_BOOK BOOK ON HIGHLIGHT.IBOOK = BOOK.IBOOK ORDER BY HIGHLIGHT.CREATED_AT DESC
